channel.title: Rate my 'Adv MP3 Player'?
channel.description:
Features: [ul][li]Add music to listbox (even while playing music)[/li] [li]Remove selected music from listbox (even while playing music)[/li] [li]Drag + Drap music onto listbox to add (only works on some computers, i tested on 5, only got it to work on 2)[/li] [li]Automatically plays next song on listbox[/li] [li]If end of listbox when song ends, it begins from the top.[/li] [li]if song playing is the one removed, stop playing and go to next song[/li] [li]if list is cleared, stop playing song[/li] [li]Different play 'modes'[/li][/ul]
*Random *Repeat song *Repeat list *No Repeat (stop at end of song)
Pic: [img]http://true-programas.netii.net/images/adMusicNote(new).PNG[/img]
DL: http://www.mediafire.com/?omdmkdtzmmz
Feel free to suggest, as long as its not stupid.
Used Suggestions: (not in this release, but have been added for the next one) [ul][li]SilentCJ - No file extension on song (ex: 'walk.mp3' now shows as 'walk')[/li][/ul]

item.title: Rate my 'Adv MP3 Player'?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:15, topic:334223”]So you didn’t make the format readers or the player itself… You just made files play on an embedded media player…?[/quote]Correct.

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:16, topic:334223”]I am currently working on a custom control for a media player, but atm, the main player is a control from C#. None of the options it has, besides playing, stopping, pausing music, would have been possible with ONLY that control though. The embedded player works through a playlist inside of itself. So it was a bit of work getting it to actually work with the listbox as well as it does.[/quote]No it isn’t… all of those methods are already there, and you just had to call them with the button click handlers…
And the list box would be easy as well…

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my 'Adv MP3 Player'?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I am currently working on a custom control for a media player, but atm, the main player is a control from C#. None of the options it has, besides playing, stopping, pausing music, would have been possible with ONLY that control though. The embedded player works through a playlist inside of itself. So it was a bit of work getting it to actually work with the listbox as well as it does.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my 'Adv MP3 Player'?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

So you didn’t make the format readers or the player itself… You just made files play on an embedded media player…?

item.title: Rate my 'Adv MP3 Player'?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:13, topic:334223”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=430625.msg3161996#msg3161996 date=1269652331]
C#, for this copy. I have copies of it in Visual-Basic, C#, One im working on in Java.
[/quote]If you’re using Visual C# isn’t there just a media control you can drag onto a form?[/quote]

Yes, but using just the “WMP” control will not get you those options alone. Sure, you can open a single song and play it, but your not going to get these ‘modes’ or anything without hard-coding them yourself.

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my 'Adv MP3 Player'?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

It supports:
[ul][li].asf[/li]
[li].asx[/li]
[li].mpa[/li]
[li].mp2[/li]
[li].mp3[/li]
[li].wm[/li]
[li].wma[/li]
[li].wmv[/li]
[li].wmd[/li]
[li].wax[/li]
[li].wvx[/li]
[li].wpl[/li]
[li].dvs-ms[/li]
[li].avi[/li]
[li].m3u[/li]
[li].mid[/li]
[li].midi[/li]
[li].rmi[/li]
[li].aif[/li]
[li].aifc[/li]
[li].aiff[/li]
[li].au[/li]
[li].snd[/li]
[li].wav[/li]
[li].cda[/li][/ul]

Also alot of Movie types as well. I cba to keep listing them

Read full topic

item.title: Rate my 'Adv MP3 Player'?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

Features:
[ul][li]Add music to listbox (even while playing music)[/li]
[li]Remove selected music from listbox (even while playing music)[/li]
[li]Drag + Drap music onto listbox to add (only works on some computers, i tested on 5, only got it to work on 2)[/li]
[li]Automatically plays next song on listbox[/li]
[li]If end of listbox when song ends, it begins from the top.[/li]
[li]if song playing is the one removed, stop playing and go to next song[/li]
[li]if list is cleared, stop playing song[/li]
[li]Different play ‘modes’[/li][/ul]

        *Random
        *Repeat song
        *Repeat list
        *No Repeat (stop at end of song)

Pic:

DL:

MediaFire

Adv MP3 Player.exe

MediaFire is a simple to use free service that lets you put all your photos, documents, music, and video in a single place so you can access them anywhere and share them everywhere.

Feel free to suggest, as long as its not stupid.

Used Suggestions: (not in this release, but have been added for the next one)
[ul][li]SilentCJ - No file extension on song (ex: ‘walk.mp3’ now shows as ‘walk’)[/li][/ul]

Read full topic
